sdm-masking-policy-difference
*****************************


Description
===========

A SDM masking policy difference resource. It helps track the
difference between sensitive columns of SDM and masking columns of the
masking policy.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* list-difference-columns

* patch-sdm-masking-policy-difference-columns

* update
